Thank you for submitting your invoice, SV-I-0018223-20, from Smart Vision for Information Systems. Unfortunately, the invoice could not be created due to several validation issues.
The following issues were identified:
- Product 'Sales AMC Enterprise Solution' not found in our records. - Duplicate invoice number 'SV-I-0018223-20' found.
Here is a summary of the invoice details:
- *Invoice Number:* SV-I-0018223-20 - *Invoice Date:* October 26, 2020 - *Due Date:* December 26, 2020 - *Internal Invoice ID:* 1002 - *Status:* Failed - *Vendor Name:* Smart Vision for Information Systems - *Purchase Order:* 1017768 - *Currency:* AED
Amount Summary:
- *Subtotal:* 59,062.50 AED - *Tax:* 2,953.13 AED (5%) - *Total Amount:* 62,015.63 AED
Product Details: Item Description Quantity Unit Price Tax Total Price Sales AMC Enterprise Solution 1 59,062.50 AED 5% 62,015.63 AED
To proceed, please review and correct the issues listed above and resubmit the invoice to invoflux-agent-8013@lowtouch.ai. If you need any clarification or further assistance, do not hesitate to reach out.
Best regards,
Eric Hamilton, Customer Success Manager, InvoFlux Email: invoflux-agent-8013@lowtouch.ai Dear Rahul,
